Class ProcessDefinitionsController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.wiredwidgets.cow.server.web.CowServerController
      • org.wiredwidgets.cow.server.web.ProcessDefinitionsController

  • @Controller
@RequestMapping(value="/processDefinitions")
public class ProcessDefinitionsController
extends CowServerController
    Handles REST API for the /processDefinitions resource
    Author:
    JKRANES

      • findLatestVersionProcessDefs

        @RequestMapping(method=GET,
                params={"!versions","!key"})
@ResponseBody
public ProcessDefinitions findLatestVersionProcessDefs()
        GET method for URL /processDefinitions. Returns the latest version for each unique processDefinition key Gets the latest version of each existing ProcessDefinition
        Returns:
        a ProcessDefinitions object, wrapping multiple ProcessDefinition objects.

      • findAllProcessDefs

        @RequestMapping(method=GET,
                params={"versions=all","!key"})
@ResponseBody
public ProcessDefinitions findAllProcessDefs()
        GET method for URL /processDefinitions?versions=all Gets all ProcessDefinitions, including all past versions of each
        Returns:
        a ProcessDefinitions object, containing the requested results

      • findLatestVersionProcessDefForKey

        @RequestMapping(method=GET,
                params={"key","!versions"})
@ResponseBody
public ProcessDefinitions findLatestVersionProcessDefForKey(@RequestParam(value="key")
                                                                               String key)
        GET method for URL /processDefinitions?key={key} Gets the latest version of a process definition, specified by key
        Parameters:
        key - the key of the requested ProcessDefininition
        Returns:
        a ProcessDefintions object containing a single ProcessDefinition element, or containing no ProcessDefinition elements if none were found for the specified key

      • deleteProcessDef

        @RequestMapping(method=DELETE,
                params={"key","!versions"})
public void deleteProcessDef(@RequestParam(value="key")
                                   String key,
                                   javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        DELETE method for URL /processDefinitions?key={key} Deletes all deployments for the specified key. No executions of this process can be running.
        Parameters:
        key - the process definition key

      • findProcessDefsForKey

        @RequestMapping(method=GET,
                params={"key","versions=all"})
@ResponseBody
public ProcessDefinitions findProcessDefsForKey(@RequestParam(value="key")
                                                                   String key)
        GET method for URL /processDefinitions?key={key}&versions=all Retrieve all versions for the specified key
        Parameters:
        key - the process definition key
        Returns:
        a ProcessDefinitions object wrapping the results.

      • getProcessDef

        @RequestMapping(method=GET,
                value="/{id}")
@ResponseBody
public ProcessDefinition getProcessDef(@PathVariable(value="id")
                                                          String id)
        GET method for URL /processDefinitions/{id} Retrieve a single ProcessDefinition by ID
        Parameters:
        id - the ProcessDefinition ID in the form [key]-[version]
        Returns:
